trait.name: Stubborn Rage
entries: The wyvern is immune to the {@condition frightened} and {@condition stunned} conditions while they have fewer than half their hit points or are within 60 feet of another wyvern they can hear or see.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wyvern makes one Stinger attack and one Bite attack. They can replace one attack with a use of Tail Sweep.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). A {@spell restoration} spell ends this effect on a target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the wyvern can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail Sweep
entries: The wyvern swipes their tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away from the wyvern.

bonus.name: Seek
entries: The wyvern takes the Search action.

monster.name: Manticore
languages: understands any one language but speaks only through the use of their Mimicry trait

trait.name: Agile Predator
entries: When the manticore hits a creature with an attack on the manticore's turn, the manticore doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of that turn.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The manticore can mimic any words or phrases they have heard in a language they understand. A creature who hears the speech can tell it is an imitation with a successful {@dc 10} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The manticore makes one Bite and one Claw attack, or two Tail Spike attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature who is {@condition frightened} of the manticore, they take an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage, and the manticore can move the target up to 5 feet horizontally.

action.name: Tail Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 100/200 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

bonus.name: Trumpeting Howl (1/Day)
entries: Each enemy within 120 feet who can hear the manticore must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the manticore for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). If the initial saving throw fails by 5 or more, a creature is also {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} while {@condition frightened} in this way.
